revision.comment: /* 3.3.x is rapidly aging and is effectively EOL. */
revision.text:
{| class="wikitable" !'''''[[Gluster_File_System_Documentation | Home!!]]''''' |} ===GlusterFS 3.6=== ====GlusterFS 3.6.2 is our latest release.====
[http://download.gluster.org/pub/gluster/glusterfs/3.6/LATEST/ Download the latest 3.6.2 here]
[https://github.com/gluster/glusterfs/blob/release-3.6/doc/release-notes/3.6.0.md Read the release notes]

===GlusterFS next versions===
[http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/Planning37 GlusterFS 3.7 planning pages]
[http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/Planning40 GlusterFS 4.0 planning pages]

===GlusterFS 3.5===
====GlusterFS 3.5.3 is the latest stable release.====
[http://blog.gluster.org/2014/11/glusterfs-3-4-6-and-glusterfs-3-5-3-released/ Release announcement]
[http://download.gluster.org/pub/gluster/glusterfs/3.5/LATEST/ See here for downloads]

Please see these links and send any questions to [https://lists.gnu.org/mailman/listinfo/gluster-devel gluster-devel].

[http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/Features35 Features included in 3.5] - this is the list of all new features we're including in GlusterFS 3.5, with links to their respective feature description pages
[http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/Upgrade_to_3.5 Upgrade to 3.5] - IMPORTANT! Please read before upgrading to GlusterFS 3.5.

===GlusterFS 3.4===
====GlusterFS 3.4.6 is a mature release and is suitable for production environments.====
[http://download.gluster.org/pub/gluster/glusterfs/3.4/LATEST/ Download it].
[https://github.com/gluster/glusterfs/blob/release-3.4/doc/release-notes/3.4.6.md 3.4.6 Release Notes].
[http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/Features34 Features included in 3.4] - this is the list of all new features in in GlusterFS 3.4, with links to their respective feature description pages
[https://vbellur.wordpress.com/2013/07/15/upgrading-to-glusterfs-3-4/ Upgrade to 3.4] - IMPORTANT! Please read before upgrading to GlusterFS 3.4.

===GlusterFS 3.3===
3.3.x is rapidly aging and is effectively EOL.

{| class="wikitable" !'''''[[Gluster_File_System_Documentation | Home!!]]''''' |}
